entry.title: deepdoctection - An open source package for document intelligence
entry.summary:
Description

Speaker:: Janis Meyer

Track: PyData: Natural Language Processing Extracting information from business documents is difficult. They often have a complex visual structure and the information they contain is not tagged. Let me introduce deepdoctection: A tool box that is intended to facilitate entry into this topic.

Recorded at the â€¦
entry.content:
Description

Speaker:: Janis Meyer

Track: PyData: Natural Language Processing Extracting information from business documents is difficult. They often have a complex visual structure and the information they contain is not tagged. Let me introduce deepdoctection: A tool box that is intended to facilitate entry into this topic.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2022 conference, April 11-13 2022. https://2022.pycon.de More details at the conference page: https://2022.pycon.de/program/HP9KVN Twitter: https://twitter.com/pydataberlin Twitter: https://twitter.com/pyconde
